column2: "Aber a Manaasɛ hyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no na oedzi mfe duebien
column3: na odzii hen mfe eduonum enum wɔ Jerusalɛm: na ne na ne dzin dze Hefzi-ba."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ wiadzefo a EWURADZE tuu hɔn fii Israelmba enyim no hɔn ndzeyɛɛ no tse."

column2: "Osiandɛ osii mbea sorɔnsorɔm a n'egya Hezekia sɛɛ no no bio; na osisii afɔrmbukyia dze maa Baal
column3: na ɔyɛɛ Asera
column4: dɛ mbrɛ Israelhen Ahab yɛe no

column2: "Na osisii afɔrmbukyia wɔ EWURADZE fie a EWURADZE kaa ho asɛm dɛ
column3: Jerusalɛm na medze me dzin mobɔto hɔ no mu."

column2: "Na osisii afɔrmbukyia dze memaa wimu ndzɛmba no nyinara wɔ EWURADZE fie abangua ebien no do."
"Na ɔhyeew ne babanyin bɔɔ afɔr
column3: na ɔyɛɛ akɔmfodze
column6: na abayifo yɛe: ɔbɔɔ mbusu pii wɔ EWURADZE enyi do dze yii no ebufuw."

column2: "Na ɔdze Asera ne siaan honyi a ɔyɛe no
column3: sii ofi no mu
column4: ofi no a EWURADZE kaa ho asɛm kyerɛɛ David na ne ba Solomon dɛ
column6: na Jerusalɛm a masan mu meyi no wɔ Israel ebusuakuw ebusuakuw nyinara mu no mu na medze me dzin mobɔto daa no a:"

column2: "nkyii so meremma Israel hɔn anan nntu mmfi asaase a medze memaa hɔn egyanom no do nkekyin bio; sɛ wɔrodwen do ara ayɛ dza medze ahyɛ hɔn no nyinara
column3: na dɛ mbrɛ mbra a m'akowaa Moses dze hyɛɛ hɔn no nyinara tse dze a."

column2: "Naaso woenntsie: na Manaasɛ daadaa hɔn ma wɔyɛɛ dza omuo seen dza amanaman a EWURADZE sɛɛ hɔn wɔ Israelmba enyim no yɛe."
"Na EWURADZE nam no nkowaa nkɔnhyɛfo no do kaa dɛ
column5: na ɔayɛ bɔn asen dza Amorifo a wodzii n'enyim no yɛe nyinara
column6: na ɔdze n'abosom ama Juda so ayɛ bɔn ntsi:"

column2: "mbrɛ EWURADZE
column3: Israel Nyankopɔn
column6: medze mbusu mereba Jerusalɛm na Juda do a obiara a ɔbɛtse no
column7: n'aso ebien nyina mu bɛyɛ no weɔɔ."

column2: "Na mobɔtwe Samaria esusuhoma mu
column3: na Ahab fie susudua promo mu maba Jerusalɛm do: na mebɛpepa Jerusalɛm mu dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa pepa nkwansɛn mu

column2: "Na mubopuw m'egyapadze nkaa no
column3: na meyi hɔn ahyɛ hɔn atamfo nsa; na wɔabɛyɛ afonam na asadze ama hɔn atamfo nyinara;"

column2: "osiandɛ wɔayɛ dza omuo wɔ m'enyi do
column3: na woeyi me ebufuw araa ofitsi da a hɔn egyanom fi Egypt bae
column4: dze bodu ndɛ da yi mpo."

column2: "Nkyii so Manaasɛ kaa bɔgya a odzi bem piigyan gui
column3: araa dze kodur dɛ ɔhyɛɛ Jerusalɛm ma fi ano kor kɛpeem kor so; ɔsor no bɔn a ɔdze maa Juda so fomee
column4: dɛ wɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do no."

column2: "Afei Manaasɛ no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column3: na dza ɔyɛe nyinara
column4: na no bɔn a ɔyɛe no
column5: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Juda ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu?"

column2: "Na Manaasɛ kɔr ne nsamankyir
column3: na wosiee no wɔ nankasa ne fie ture no mu
column4: wɔ Uza no ture no mu: na ne babanyin Amon dzii hen wɔ n'ananmu."

column2: "Aber a Amon hyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no nna oedzi mfe eduonu ebien; na odzii hen mfe ebien wɔ Jerusalɛm: na ne na ne dzin Mesullemet
column3: Haruz a ofi Jotba ne babaa a."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do
column3: dɛ mbrɛ n'egya Manaasɛ yɛe."

column2: "Na ɔnantseew ɔkwan a n'egya nantseew mu no nyinara mu
column3: na ɔsoom abosom no a n'egya somee no

column2: "na ɔpoow EWURADZE
column3: n'egyanom Nyankopɔn no
column4: na ɔannantsew EWURADZE no kwan mu."

column2: "Na Amon no nkowaa paam ne tsir do
column3: na wokum ɔhen no wɔ nankasa ne fie."

column2: "Na asaase no do nkorɔfo no kunkum hɔn a wɔpaam ɔhen Amon ne tsir do no nyinara; na asaase no do ɔman no hyɛɛ ne babanyin Josia ɔhen wɔ n'ananmu."
"Afei Amon no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column3: dza ɔyɛe no
column4: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Juda ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu?"

column2: "Na wosiee no wɔ n'asamandan no mu wɔ Uza no ture no mu: na ne babanyin Josia dzii hen wɔ n'ananmu."
